alert.note: Alert for Accomack (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued January 25 at 1:24PM EST until January 26 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 4 AM EST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Large breaking waves of 7 to 9 feet expected in the surf zone. * WHERE...In Maryland, Maryland Beaches County. In Virginia, Accomack County. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 4 AM EST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Dangerous swimming and surfing conditions and localized beach erosion. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Ocean City Inlet MD MLLW Categories - Minor 4.0 ft, Moderate 5.0 ft, Major 6.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.5 ft, Moderate 2.5 ft, Major 3.5 ft TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 25/10 PM 2.4 -0.1 0.5 1 NONE 26/11 AM 1.7 -0.8 -0.4 1 NONE 27/12 AM 1.2 -1.3 -0.8 1 NONE 27/12 PM 1.3 -1.2 -0.6 1 NONE 28/01 AM 1.5 -1.0 -0.4 1 NONE SAXIS VA MLLW CATEGORIES - info.instruction: Inexperienced swimmers should remain out of the water due to dangerous surf conditions.
